shri lanka polis prathisanskarana kamituwa shri lanka polis prathisanwidhana kamituwa meyata wasara 150 kata pera pihituwana lada shri lanka polisiya dashaka gananawak pura merata pawathi gatumkari wathawaranaya hamuwe nirantharawa opamattam wemin wathman thaththwaya dakwa prasaranaya wiya.

‘wasarakata shri lankawe mawuwarunge kusa thula daruwan 1730 k miya yame khedawachakayata thitha thabamu’ themawa yatathe saukhya adhyapana karyanshaye pawathi madhya hamuwata sahabhagi wemin ee mahatha me bawa eeye (22) prakasha kaleya.

hugak dawas walata api dakina de thamayi parlimenthuwa ambalamak wageyi .mona dhanaskandayak me rate minissunge salliwalin wiyadam karanawada parlimenthu sabhawarayak pawathwanna .mahajana niyojithayo parlimenthuwata sahabhagiwenne naththam eka barapathala waradak .kathanayakathumata yojanawak karanawa meka mage yojanawak neme rate purawasiyange yojanawak hatiyata salaka balanna kiyalayi mama illa sitinne .kisiyam mahajana niyojithayekuta adhikaranaye penisitimata thibenam edina parlimenthuwata sahabhagi nowimata kathanayakawaraya nithiyak panawiya yuthuyi .nathahoth ee wenuwen aniwarya niwadu labadiyayuthuyi .

nidan inna punchima kakulu nupurudu ira eliyata baye angaddi nalawili githa kiyala nalawanna oona...thamath aharenna welasana wadi bawa hithuwakkara wela dangalana punchi kakulu walata eeththu yannama kiya denna oona.aharenna oona- eeth aharenna kammali mal kithi kawala aharawanna oona.thana aggisse dilisena punchi pini kata dowala punchi pethi depethi noridenna eewa matha thawaranna oona.sumudu pethi thala nogena hin siruwe aharenna iwasima denna oona.man hamadama yuhuyuluwa wada kala...sindu kiyala katahanga gorosu wuna..eeth kurulu githayakata wada pipena punchi malak kochchara watinawada?man ehema hithuwakurulu giya ahenne gayana welawata witharayi.eeth pipuna malak ruwata suwandata dawas kipayakma thiyanawa.man thaniyama hithuwa..umbaala maha kalawak mada thaniyen pipila innawa.harima suwandayi..lassanayi..eeth kale katu akul walin wahila..eliye katawath umbaalawa dakinna baha...mata ee gana thibune wachana walin kiyala iwara karanna bari tharam dukak...lassana mal pipila..enna awith balanna...man kaleta pipuna mal osseth ankura osseth lokayata hangagala kiwwa..ee githa dige goda waduna lokaya man tharamatama umbaalata aadaraya karanna gaththa..kochchara lassanada kurulu jiwithaya.kochchara watinawada kurulu jiwithaya...kochchara sathutakda kurullek wena eka man lokayata hanga gala kiwwa...mal godak madde gewena kurulu jiwithaya...paradisiyak ....anthimata man thiranaya kala...mage kuduwa athule ekama eka malak wath pipune nathuwata mokada...mage jiwithema gewenne waiwarna mal yayaka....eeth ee sarpayek mage kurulu hadawathata dashta karana kal witharayi.sarpa wisha hadawathe shira witharak nemeyi dhamani osse gala yana kota man eka deyak pasak kara gaththa...hithata ekangawa kurullek wena eka koyi tharam moda wadakda?nikan ohe sindu kiyana eka witharak kala nan koyi tharan nan hondada?kurulu hadawathak wunath sarpa wisha pathirunata passe issara wage piwithuru na...wisha walin othpala una hitha issara wage karyakshamath na..anthimata man thiranayak gaththa...mage giya man gayannan ...uolage widiyata umbaala pipiyalla...thiranaya gaththe kurulu hadawathada naththan sarpa wishada kiyala mata hariyata ninawuwak na...eeth man thiranatak gaththa...hetath ira ahareyi....eeth man sindu kiyanawama witharayi...pini diya dowa ganna eka...
